asthiyak bindunama me api katha kala paddhathiyama binda watenawa , ekinekata sambandha wela katayuthu kala kattiyage wada tikak adala wenawa ..habayi , kohoma hari api kadichcha ata kali ekineka lan karala thibboth himin sare ara ‘wada karayo“ aaye ekathu wela kadichcha thana ha karala asthi bindima suwapath karanawa ....prathikarayeda pradhanawa siduwanne mekayi , thawath wisthara kaloth prathikaraye mulika aramunu wenne , asthiye wenwunu muhunath puluwan tharam nawatha lan karala , sthawarawa , noselwi thiya ganna ekath , ee thuwala athulata wishabija athulu nowana widiyata aaraksha karaganna ekath ( waradilawath me asthi athulata wishabijayak athulu wunoth sahena karadarayakata watenawa ..ee gana mita pera lipiyakadi katha kala mathakayi) , awashya poshanaya laba dena ekath , wedanawa palanaya karaganna ekath thamayi , me tika hariyata kerunoth “swabhawika kriyawaliyak “ widiyata nawathath asthiya hawenawa , me sandaha gatha wana kalaya nam wayasa , roga thaththwa , asthiye swabhawaya anuwa ekinekata wenas wenna puluwan .
